name: Balance (itch) (Woollington)
description:
IGMC 2017 Entry.

Balance is an unfulfilled life simulator where -you- go to work and decide how to relax afterwards before waking up the next day and going back to work, to decide how to wake up after wards before waking up the next day...

Features:

Graphics that have some semblance of colour!*

Sound

Interactive elements!

Maybe a few lines that are kind of funny.

*Mostly grey counts as  a colour, right?
